issue.title: 5278.cc
issue.body:
### Issue URL (Anti Adblock Script) [NSFW] [https://5278.cc/forum.php?mod=viewthread&tid=1360382&extra=page%3D1%26filter%3Dauthor%26orderby%3Ddateline%26typeid%3D50](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2F5278.cc%2Fforum.php%3Fmod%3Dviewthread%26tid%3D1360382%26extra%3Dpage%253D1%2526filter%253Dauthor%2526orderby%253Ddateline%2526typeid%253D50) ### Comment > 開啟ADGUARD時看不到網站的播放器，關閉之後就可以看到，明顯是被偵測到ADGUARD ### [NSFW] Screenshots
Screenshot 1 [Screenshot 1](https://reports-img.adguard.com/na4CIqL.jpg)
Screenshot 2 [Screenshot 2](https://reports-img.adguard.com/6Pu59Jq.jpg)
### System configuration Information | value --- | --- AdGuard product: | AdGuard for Windows v7.12 Browser: | Chrome AdGuard driver: | WFP Stealth mode options: | Hide your search queries,
Send Do-Not-Track header,
Remove X-Client-Data header from HTTP requests,
Self-destructing third-party cookies (180) DNS filtering: | server: `https://dns.adguard.com/dns-query`
filters: `User+rules` Filters: | Ad Blocking:
AdGuard Base

Privacy:
AdGuard Tracking Protection

Social Widgets:
AdGuard Social Media

Language-specific:
AdGuard Chinese,
AdGuard German,
AdGuard Japanese Userscripts: | https://userscripts.adtidy.org/release/adguard-extra/1.0/adguard-extra.user.js,
https://userscripts.adtidy.org/release/popup-blocker/2.5/popupblocker.user.js Referrer: | [https://5278.cc/forum.php?mod=forumdisplay&fid=23&filter=author&orderby=dateline&typeid=50](https://adguardteam.github.io/AnonymousRedirect/redirect.html?url=https%3A%2F%2F5278.cc%2Fforum.php%3Fmod%3Dforumdisplay%26fid%3D23%26filter%3Dauthor%26orderby%3Ddateline%26typeid%3D50)

issue.title: Странный кликандер!
issue.body:
### Prerequisites

- [X] This site DOES NOT contain sexually explicit material, otherwise use [NSFW-specific form](./new?template=bug_report_NSFW.yml);
- [X] Filters were updated before reproducing an issue;
- [X] AdGuard product version is up-to-date;
- [X] Browser version is up-to-date;
- [X] If the site or app is broken, disabling AdGuard protection resolves an issue.

### What product do you use?

AdGuard for Android

### AdGuard version

v3.6.11 (54-1.10.186cl)

### What type of problem have you encountered?

Annoyances — pop-ups, cookie warnings, etc.

### Which browser(s) do you use?

Chrome

### Which device do you use?

Mobile

### Where is the problem encountered?

https://news.google.com/articles/CBMiiwFodHRwczovL3d3dy5keW5hbW9tYW5pYS5jb20vcnUvbmV3cy82Nzg5NjUtaXNrdXNzdHZlbm55ai1pbnRlbGxla3QtcG9weXRhbHN5YS12eWJyYXQtc2xlZHV5dXNjaGVnby10cmVuZXJhLWRseWEtZGluYW1vLWNodG8taXotZXRvZ28tdnlzaGxv0gEA?hl=ru&gl=UA&ceid=UA%3Aru

### What filters do you have enabled?

AdGuard Base filter, AdGuard Mobile Ads filter, AdGuard Russian filter, AdGuard URL Tracking filter, AdGuard Social Media filter, AdGuard Annoyances filter

### What Stealth Mode options do you have enabled?

Send Do-Not-Track signals

### Add your comment and screenshots

С гугл новостей перенаправляет на юрл `https://www.dynamomania.com/ru/news/678965-iskusstvennyj-intellekt-popytalsya-vybrat-sleduyuschego-trenera-dlya-dinamo-chto-iz-etogo-vyshlo`, и только после перехода с гугл ньюс на целевой юрл , при переходе по внутренним ссылкам можно словить кликандер,не иначе!😶

### Privacy

- [X] I agree to follow this condition
